KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Drudge Doom

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Stalker Stalker

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Altered Hunter

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Altered Hunter

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: In the meantime I need to rid the surrounding area of some of these Drudges.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Augmented Hunter

KillTask.TaskName: Armoredillo Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 30 of the armoredillos within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your help.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done.

KillTask.TaskName: Golem Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 15 of the golems within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your assistance.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done.

KillTask.TaskName: Mumiyah Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 30 of the Mumiyah within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your assistance.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done.

KillTask.TaskName: Reedshark Hunting: Lost City of Neftet
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will kill 30 of the reedsharks within the canyon walls or up on the plateaus, I will reward you for your aid to the crown.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Gurog Soldiers and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Always a pleasure to meet someone who shares my hatred of these beasts.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Gurog Minions and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Ugly creatures aren't they? Glad to be rid of them.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Gurog Henchmen and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Hardly a scratch on you as well, you truly are a great warrior.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Snow Tuskers and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Fantastic job! Those mutated beasts need to be put down, every kill helps.

KillTask.TaskName: Snow Tusker Kill Task (Snow Tusker Warrior)
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Snow Tusker Warriors and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Their coats remind me of the creature know as a wolf back on Ispar.

KillTask.TaskName: Snow Tusker Kill Task (Snow Tusker Leader)
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 10 Snow Tusker Leaders and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Amazing that you survived, those tusks can spear a man all the way through.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 10 of these Frozen Dreads and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Those creatures haunt my dreams.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 20 Frozen Wights and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Those creatures send chills down my spine.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 15 Shadow Flyers and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! That should at least keep the corruption from spreading any further.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 25 of the shadows to fight back this corruption.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! If you keep this up, Tou-Tou may be ours once again.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 15 Devourer Marguls and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! The flapping of those leathery wings is quieter already.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 15 Grievver Shredders and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! The clicking of those

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 15 Void Lords and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! That should help me sleep at night.

KillTask.TaskName: Aun Golem Hunters: Mud Golem Sludge Lord
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!

KillTask.TaskName: Aun Golem Hunters: Copper Golem Kingpin
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!

KillTask.TaskName: Aun Golem Hunters: Glacial Golem Margrave
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!

KillTask.TaskName: Aun Golem Hunters: Magma Golem Exarch
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!

KillTask.TaskName: Aun Golem Hunters: Coral Golem Viceroy
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!

KillTask.TaskName: Aun Golem Hunters: Platinum Golem Mountain King
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill five of these golems, return to me and I will see that your battles are rewarded!
Also, if you and your fellows succeed in defeating one, I will be pleased to share with you the bounties I have recovered from my previous victories.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Your tale was truly one of triumph!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I'm authorized to pay a bounty for culling the population of escaped moarsmen prisoners by twenty.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: For culling the moarsman prisoner population here's the bounty you're owed.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I'm authorized to pay a bounty for the death of the Blessed moarsman leader.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: For putting down the Blessed leader here's the bounty you're owed.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I'm authorized to pay a bounty for the death of the Ardent moarsman leader.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: For putting down the Ardent leader here's the bounty you're owed.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I'm authorized to pay a bounty for the death of the Verdant moarsman leader.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: For putting down the Verdant leader here's the bounty you're owed.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you would be willing to go there and prove your prowess by destroying 100 of these strange golems, I will reward you handsomely for your actions.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done, well done indeed. You have proven your skill and honored my task. I thank you. Here is the reward promised.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I'll tell ye what. If ye go out there and kill 50 of those tentacles for me, just the ones on Freebooter, mind ye, I'll make it worth ye while.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: That should do it! The Mana flows around the Ruins of Degar'Alesh are moving much better now, thank ye. Here's a little something for yer efforts.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I wish you to destroy 100 of the foul, Blighted Coral Golems upon the isle.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Impressively done, Honored Master. You have accomplished all I have wished from you. Now, for your promised reward.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Survive, kill 50 Blessed Moarsmen, and I'll make sure you are recognized for your valorous service to our Society.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations, you survived and succeeded. Here, allow me to reward you for your assistance to our Society.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Go there and defeat 10 Phalanx.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Satisfactory. Take these rewards as compensation for your efforts.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: The society will appreciate any efforts you make towards their extermination.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You've done well in exterminating this aggressive breed of Phyntos.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I wish you to destroy 20 of the Sclavi who roam this isle
If you would rid us of say 20 of those beasts

KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done! Here, allow me to reward you for your assistance to our Society.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: In order to control the population of hyper aggressive Phyntos I'm contracting adventurers to kill their larvae.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work infiltrating the Phyntos hive and killing their larvae.
Well done! Here, allow me to reward you for your assistance to our Society.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Just concern yourself with killing 12 Wight Blade Sorcerers, and report back to me when you're done.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations! Twelve dead Wight Blade Sorcerers. Our field researchers will be quite pleased. I can reward you now.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Destroy 10 of these corrupted gargoyles to ease the pain of those that wander these halls and I will reward you.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done, champion. You must be skilled indeed. Allow me to reward you.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you want to help me, kill 100 of these Grave Rats. Maybe then I will have more work for you.
Those Squires are becoming a serious problem. They constantly interupt the supply lines to our camp. Destroy 10 of them and I'll reward you.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Given the time it takes for these things to regroup, I'll have more work for you by this time tomorrow.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you wish to help me, just head over to the area these 'Gear Knights' have occupied and kill 10 Knights.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations, you survived and succeeded. Here, allow me to reward you for your assistance to our Queen.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Near the center of these invading forces, you'll find a Gear Knight called the Iron Blade Commander.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: I am pleased to see that you have been successful. Allow me to reward you for your assistance to the Crown.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Bronze Gauntlet Troopers.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations, you survived and succeeded.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Copper Cog Troopers.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations, you survived and succeeded.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Iron Blade Troopers.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations, you survived and succeeded.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Silver Scope Troopers.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations, you survived and succeeded.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill him five times and maybe he will learn not to go around stealing other peoples dreams.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent, I hope that teaches ol' Three Eye a lesson.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 100 of the terrible Wicked Skeletons for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend! You have slain many of the terrible beasts! Allow me to reward you!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 250 of the terrible Tukora Lieutenants for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 25 of the Tumerok Gladiators for me, and I will reward you for your aid in the defense of Dryreach.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Return to me after you have killed 500 Tusker Guards and I will reward you.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent, now go contemplate what you have learned from fighting the Tusker Guards.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 30 Umbral Rifts and let me know of your adventures.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Truly amazing isn't it. You are one of us, you are a Rift Walker.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 50 of them for me, and I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You do the Carenzi a great service.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you slay 75 of these strange beings, come to me.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: As the hero Yaziq al-Tazar returned triumphant, so do you return to me now.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Go there now, and slay 75 Virindi Quidioxes.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: It is done!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Slay 50 of the Voracious Eater and I will sing your name to the elders of my xuta.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Ah, buhdi, you do my xuta a grand service. I thank you.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Go out and kill 100 Wisps in this area and I will reward you.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work in your hunt. We'll find your reports very useful.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will do me the honor of killing 5 of the Golem Samurai within the towns or up within the walled fortress, I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done, well done indeed.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will do me the honor of killing 15 of the Spectral Archers within the towns or up within the walled fortress, I will reward you for your assistance.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will assist me by killing 10 of the Spectral Bushi within the towns or up within the walled fortress, I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Thank you for your assistance.

KillTask.TaskName: Spectral Blade and Claw Kill Task
KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: To that end, if you aid me in hunting 10 of the Spectral Claw Adepts, Claw Masters, Blade Adepts or Blade Masters, I'll happily reward you for your help.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Your skill is quite remarkable.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: While these two types of spirits continue to exist, they pose a tremendous threat to the kingdom.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Your skill is remarkable.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will aid me by killing 15 of the Spectral Minions within the towns or up within the walled fortress, I will reward your good work.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Your hunt for today is complete.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: To that end, if you will do me the honor of killing 5 of the Spectral Nanjou Shou-jen within the towns or up within the walled fortress, I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Thank you for your aid my assigned task.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will do me the honor of killing 10 of the Spectral Samurai within the towns or up within the walled fortress, I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Your skill is exceptional.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Killing 50 should be enough to get an eye off of the larger, eye covered one.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Ahh, success. The researchers will be very pleased.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Well then. Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Arctic Mattekars for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I would like you to experience the hunting of the elusive banished creatures.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent, you are now an experienced hunted of banished creatures.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: I would like you to experience the hunting of the elusive fallen creatures.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent, you are now an experienced hunted of fallen creatures.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 50 Benek Niffis and rewards shall be yours.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: It is pleased. Rewards unto thee.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 10 of the terrible Blood Shreth for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: It won't make them go away but I'll reward you for every 50 Coral Golems that you kill.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Those Coral Golems won't be scratching my armor again.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Deathcap Thrungum for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 10 of the terrible Dire Mattekars for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Ebon Gromnies for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Fight twenty-five of these creatures and then return to me and tell me everything you learned about them.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Very interesting, I hope I can use this information to further my research.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Floesharks for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Return to me with anything you've learned after destroying 25 Gold Gear Troopers.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Congratulations, you survived and succeeded.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 100 of the terrible Grievver Violators for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you want to prove you're a real hunter track down and slay 40 of those lumbering Guruk Bashers and I'll reward you.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Search the Southern Catacombs and kill 30 of those colossal brutes!
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Good job!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Go and kill 30 of the cunning fiends lurking in the lower Southern Catacombs and I'll reward you for your help.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: By the fungal roots, you humans can hunt better than anyone I've ever seen!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you want to prove you're a real hunter, track down and slay 40 of those despicable Guruk Marauders and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: I'm impressed. I didn't think a human could hunt that well.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Take your weapon and hunt down 10 of the Guruk Monstrosities and I will reward you.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Thank you, I can sleep soundly for a time.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 40 of those infuriating Guruk Smashers and I'll reward you well.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Yes! Those vandals got what was coming to them!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Do me a favor, friend, and kill 25 of these Hea Windreaves for me.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You do my heart much good.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Iron-Spined Chitticks for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 35 of the cunning Kilif Zefir for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 25 of the terrible K'nath An'drases for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you would slay 25 of the beasts, I would reward you as a hunter whose prowess is equal to mine own.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: You kill 25 Moar, and Tibik reward Strong Traveler from Faraway.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent! Tibik be sneaky now.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 175 of the terrible Mosswart Worshippers for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Mottled Carenzi for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Slay forty of the Mosswart Townsfolk who live in the Mosswart holding, then return back to me.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Well done, warrior.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: A sacrifice of 50 Mucky Moarsmen must be made.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: It is pleased.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 100 of the terrible Naughty Skeletons for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 20 Olthoi Drones and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You have slain many Olthoi Drones!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 10 Olthoi Nettlers and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You have slain many Olthoi Nettlers!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 20 Olthoi Nymphs and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You have slain many Olthoi Nymphs!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 250 of the terrible Olthoi Rippers for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill, let's say, 50 of these Paradox-touched Grubs, and I'll reward you for your aid in this.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You've done it!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Slay them, 50 should do for now, and return to me.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: You have done well.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Well then. Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Plate Armoredillos for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 10 of the terrible Polardillos for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 25 of the terrible Polar Ursuine for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Use that list as a reference. Kill 50 of the creatures
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent, you are now an experienced hunter of the most elusive creatures.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 50 Remoran Sea Raptors so that they will know their place.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Enough! No more Remoran Sea Raptors need die.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 50 of the terrible Repugnant Eaters for me, and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: 30 of the Ruschk in the valley, and then acquire one of their smaller Ice Totems from the encampment
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Ahh, the Ice Totem.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Slay 75 of these things and return to me, and I shall reward you.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Your task was effectively done.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Kill 75 and come back ta me.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Why, ye've done exactly the task I asked o' ye!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: It bids me to tell you to kill 50 of the Shallows Gorgers.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: It has chosen to reward you for completing the task it set before you.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Track down and slay 150 of those lurking Sishalti Tentacles, Tendrils and Eye Stalks for me and I will reward you appropriately.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent work, friend!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you will go thin out their number, say, kill 15 of the Small Mukkir Fledglings, I will reward you for your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Excellent! The Queen will be most pleased.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: If you seek to truely explor your own essence I'd suggest you kill 350 or more Tenebrous Rifts, it's truly amazing.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: To have experienced that many rifts you must truly be chosen.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Destroy 6 of the Desert Cactus and I will reward your efforts.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: The less insects around here, the better!

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Watch your step and kill 20 Frost Golems
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: Those giant beasts of ice fall all the more magnificently.

KillTask.NPCYellowFlagText: Destroy 4 of these Frozen Crystals and you will be rewarded.
KillTask.NPCYellowCompleteText: That was some fine destruction, my friend!
